【活動】法語歌唱工作坊 French Singing Workshop
󠀠
Dates｜日期：週二 Tuesday 10/31~2/26 (除了12/26, 1/16, 1/23, 1/30, 2/06, 2/13)
Time｜時間：7:00~9:00 p.m.
Weeks｜週數：12
Venue｜地點：C103, College of the Arts 藝術學院C103教室
Instructor｜指導者：Prof. Anne Rodier 羅安娜老師
Teaching Assistant｜助教：Maxime Terrenne 司馬太
Registration link｜報名網址：https://forms.gle/if33mjpFvA2TrAXS6
Registration deadline｜報名截止：11/15
󠀠
對唱歌及法語有興趣的同學看過來！由音樂學系的羅安娜老師教導專業歌唱技巧，指導道地的法語發音，感受的音樂魅力與法語歌曲的風情，開心學習如何唱出悅耳的法語歌！還有機會參加全國法語歌唱大賽！

工作坊教學以英語進行，中文為輔。尤其建議修習過法語（一）課程的同學一同參與！

We present the French singing workshop to those who enjoy singing and the French language! Professor Anne Rodier from the Music Department offers professional instruction in singing skills and French pronunciation. Enjoy the musical atmosphere and learn how to properly sing a good French song!

The workshop will be conducted mainly in English, along with Mandarin. Those who have taken French (I) course are most welcome to join us! There's even a chance for you to join the national French singing contest!
